metadata.title: CVE-2022-31610 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys), where a local user with basiccapabilities can cause an out-of-bounds write, which may lead to codeexecution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, informationdisclosure, or data tampering.
